variables.variable: import os files = os.listdir("./") solvers_converged = not "matrixdump" in files and not "matrixdump.info" in files

import glob files = glob.glob1(".","*.err-?") err_n_lines = {} for file in files: fileHandle = open(file) log = fileHandle.read() logSplit = log.split("\n") print(file + ":") for line in logSplit[-10:]: print(line) err_n_lines[file] = len(logSplit) fileHandle.close()

import glob files = glob.glob1(".","*.log-?") log_n_lines = {} for file in files: fileHandle = open(file) log = fileHandle.read() logSplit = log.split("\n") print(file + ":") for line in logSplit[-10:]: print(line) log_n_lines[file] = len(logSplit) fileHandle.close()
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat domain_area = stat("landslide_benchmark.stat")["Water"]["ConstantField"]["integral"]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat no_nodes = stat("landslide_benchmark.stat")["CoordinateMesh"]["nodes"]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat finish_time = stat("landslide_benchmark.stat")["ElapsedTime"]["value"][-1]

from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat integral_tracer_7 = stat("landslide_benchmark.stat")["Water"]["OtherTracer"]["surface_integral%7"]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat integral_tracer_8 = stat("landslide_benchmark.stat")["Water"]["Tracer"]["surface_integral%8"]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat integral_tracer_9 = stat("landslide_benchmark.stat")["Water"]["Tracer"]["surface_integral%9"]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat integral_tracer_dg_1 = stat("landslide_benchmark.stat")["Water"]["OtherTracerP1DG"]["surface_integral%1"]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat integral_tracer_dg_2 = stat("landslide_benchmark.stat")["Water"]["OtherTracerP1DG"]["surface_integral%2"]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat integral_tracer_dg_6 = stat("landslide_benchmark.stat")["Water"]["TracerP1DG"]["surface_integral%6"]

from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat integral_tracer_dg_9 = stat("landslide_benchmark.stat")["Water"]["TracerP1DG"]["surface_integral%9"]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat region_id_1 = stat("landslide_benchmark.detectors")["Water"]["RegionIDs"]["Region1"]
from fluidity_tools import stat_parser as stat region_id_2 = stat("landslide_benchmark.detectors")["Water"]["RegionIDs"]["Region2"]
